root.name: Absolute Force Online
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by TQ Digital, Absolute Force Online is first-person shooter built on the Unreal Engine 3. According to the games homepage it offers "luscious graphics that perfectly displays full-motion video effects, which helps usher it into a new era for visual experience in network gaming".No release date has been announced yet, but a closed beta starts November 14th 2012. Only players in the US, Canada, Australia and New Zealand are eligible to participate.GameplaySimilar to other online MMO shooters like APB Reloaded, Absolute Force Online offers character customization, allowing players to to dress up their male or female character in a range of outfits, including a "red plumber suit" that is more than reminiscent of Mario's outfit.The game is split into seven different kinds of modes, namely Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Bomb, Capture The Flag, Zombie, Vehicle and Arsenal, which plays like Call of Duty's gun game mode.In Vehicle mode, players have access to helicopters spread out around the map. Weapon cases on the ground give players a temporary rocket launcher that can be used to shoot down the helicopters.The game is further split into two different kinds of rulesets called "Battlefields". In "Classic Battlefield" players can only play in first-person view, but in "Hero Battlefield" both first and third-person view is available. Once a player have died too many times in "Hero Battlefield", they will respawn as a Hero Character with highly increased power and abilities.
